values: Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 3)Brothers — Feel, Think, Preach God (Part 3)

Our churches don’t need better productions and more entertainment. We need pastors and leaders who give themselves completely to exalting the supremacy of God in absolutely everything.Our churches don’t need better productions and more entertainment. We need pastors and leaders who give themselves completely to exalting the supremacy of God in absolutely everything.
